title: BREAKING: Seattle Seahawks Sign Former Vikings Kicker Blair Walsh | Vikings Blog | KFAN FM 100.3
text:
Digital Content Manager | KFAN.com 
Former Minnesota Vikings kicker Blair Walsh has reportedly found a new team. 
According to the team's official Twitter account, Walsh has signed with the Seattle Seahawks, a surprising team given that they already have struggling kicker Steven Hauschka on the roster. Also quite an ironic signing being that Walsh, while with Minnesota, missed a 27-yard field goal against the Seahawks in the playoffs that allowed Seattle to move on and ended Minnesota's season. Seahawks sign kicker Blair Walsh. â€” Seattle Seahawks (@Seahawks) February 9, 2017 
While with the Vikings, Walsh finished with 133 made field goals on 158 attempts (84.2 percent) while making 156 extra-points on 165 attempts. 
It appears as though Walsh will be in a kicking competition with Hauschka but will at least have an opportunity to revive his career. Check out Vikings.com for more information and Minnesota Vikings coverage throughout the year! Contact
